input.sentences: everyone was having a great time .
people sat under the tents to stay out of the sun .
what a great day everyone had .
output.sentences: I am riding in a bike race this weekend.
Here's a picture of me almost to the finish line.
I was so tired after I drank a lot of water.
There were many tents set up to visit before or after.
I finished off the day with buying a new green bike.
